fields.name: Shakedown (1x, Charge 110%):
fields.value: Steal one random unlocked, non-passive ability from your target. It will become locked until the next time they place in the top 3.

fields.name: Buff Backup (1x, Charge 75%):
fields.value: Target a mafia member. They gain immunity to roleblocks tonight, and you will attack one random visitor of theirs (prioritizing Town Investigative players).

fields.name: Concussive Effect (Passive):
fields.value: If you attack a player and they survive, they will be roleblocked this and the following night.
